English.alert_about:
PromptKit is a shortcut library that prompts the user input via menus or dictation. It supports multiple languages, numbers, freeform questions, yes/no questions, and questions with specific answers.

It also can send and receive information from external shortcuts.
English.alert_shortcuts_retrieval: Retrieving a list of installed PromptKit Story shortcuts. This may take a few moments.
English.alert_update_none: You are currently running the latest version of PromptKit.
English.default_unlockPrompt: You will need to unlock this device in order to address this PromptKit prompt/story.
English.error_function_unknown: The Return object was not handled properly.
English.error_history_none: There is no history to go back to.
English.error_history_oob: That history item does not exist.
English.error_language_unknown: PromptKit could not detect the inputted language.
English.error_locked: PromptKit requires the device to be unlocked in order to dictate text.
English.error_message_missing: No message text was supplied to PromptKit
English.error_offline: You must be connected to the internet to check for updates.
English.error_scene_invalid: There was an error reading the PromptKit Scene. The scene was not in the correct dictionary format.
English.error_shortcut_missing: The shortcut could not be found on this iOS device: {{shortcut}}
English.error_type_unknown: An unknown prompt type was requested: {{type}}.
English.label_mode_handsfree: Use dictation for prompts that do not specify a mode
English.label_mode_manual: Use menus and dialogs for prompts that do not specify a mode
English.label_modeOverride_handsfree: Dictation will always be used with prompts
English.label_modeOverride_manual: Menus and dialogs will always be used with prompts
English.menu_run_search_description: Search for more PKS shortcuts on RoutineHub
English.menu_settings_askStoryMode_description: Set the mode of a story before running
English.menu_settings_displayOriginal_descriptio: Both the translated and original message will be displayed in dialogs and alerts.
Only the translated message will be displayed in dialogs and alerts.
English.prompt_history: Jump back to a previous point in this story.
English.prompt_language_unknown: The language could not be detected for the inputted text. Continue using the default language?
English.prompt_run: PromptKit Story shortcuts have the word `PKS` in their name.
English.prompt_runText: Enter contents of a  PromptKit JSON or text to have it run by PromptKit.
English.prompt_settings_defaultMode: Choose the mode to use when none is specified or when Mode Override is enabled
English.prompt_settings_repeat: Enter the default number of times PromptKit will re-ask the question before exiting.
English.prompt_settings_unlockPrompt: Enter the prompt that will be spoken when your device is locked.
English.prompt_story_mode: How would you like this story presented?
English.prompt_translationLanguage:
Change the language used for automatic translation of prompts.

Note: The language name must match the name of the language from the Translate Text with Microsoft action.
English.prompt_unlock: You will need to unlock this device in order to run this PromptKit prompt.

Français.alert_about:
PromptKit is a shortcut library that asks for user input via dictation. It handles asking for numbers, freeform questions, and yes/no questions.

You can restrict responses to a list of answers, and PromptKit repeats the question if it did not understand the user's response.

https://tow.com/shortcuts/promptkit/

Adam Tow • tow.com • @atow
